CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Here , the atomic force microscopy ( AFM ) was applied to investigate the morphology of the blend film of the polymer : PC 70 BM fabricated from CB and DCB solutions , respectively , as shown in Fig.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. PC 70 BM: This is the name of the polymer material used in the blend film.
2. CB: This is the name of one of the solutions used to fabricate the blend film.
3. DCB: This is the name of the other solution used to fabricate the blend film.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to "Material Name" in the given paragraph:

1. PC 70 BM: This is the name of the polymer material used in the blend film.

So, the list of entities that refer to "Material Name" is:

1. PC 70 BM

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities that refer to "Material Name" in the given paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PC 70 BM |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

2. Castor bean (CB)
3. Dicyclopentadiene (DCB)

These are the entities that clearly refer to material properties, such as the type of polymer (PC 70 BM), the source of the polymer (castor bean), and the chemical composition of the polymer (dicyclopentadiene).
